name: ABBYY FineReader Document Options File
summary: Learn about .FBT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FBT files can be loaded in ABBYY FineReader by following these steps:
Choose Tools â†’ Options from the application menu.
Click the Load from File... button.

description: File used by ABBYY FineReader, a program that uses OCR technology to convert images and other documents into searchable text documents; saves user patterns and language information that assist the software in recognizing text.
